content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or preferences, but I can suggest some popular and delicious dishes that are worth trying in Chippenham during the summer season:

1. Summer berries salad - A refreshing salad that includes locally grown fresh berries like strawberries, raspberries, blackberries, and blueberries along with mixed greens, sliced almonds, and a light vinaigrette.

2. BBQ pulled pork - A smoky, slow-cooked pork served with homemade BBQ sauce that is perfect for outdoor summer dining.

3. Fish and chips - A classic British dish that is often served with a side of mushy peas and goes well with a cold pint of beer on a warm summer day.

4. Cheese and onion pie - A savory pie made with locally sourced Wiltshire cheese and onions, served with a side salad or vegetables.

5. Cream tea - A quintessential English afternoon treat that includes freshly baked scones, clotted cream, and jam, accompanied by a pot of tea.

These are just a few examples, but there are many other delicious dishes to try in Chippenham during the summer season. Local restaurants and cafes will often have their own seasonal menus featuring fresh and locally sourced ingredients.
